CustomField.description: Uesd to flag whether Other Address is populated and hence should be used for HCP Invoices and 1099. This field is used by A5 Doc for conditional merge section.
CustomField.formula: if ( And ( NOT(ISBLANK( OtherCity)), NOT(ISBLANK( OtherState)), NOT(ISBLANK( OtherStreet)), NOT(ISBLANK( OtherPostalCode))), true, false)
CustomField.label: Use Other Address
